content.body: rbuckton: Understood.  I'm sorry, your constraint didn't mention source phase imports, and thus wasn't considered in the scheduling of the continuation.  The time slot for the continuation was the only possible time/day for this item.  I'll defer to guybedford and Luca Casonato for how they wish to proceed.

content.body: littledan: it'd be great if we could ask the stenographer tomorrow to bump up their line length to as close to infinity as possible, and also to autocorrect any multiple spaces down into one, including after a period
